_meanings:
{@--4@} Then,
at that time (<ab>Ved.</ab>); {#kaH kotra BoH#} who
is there? which of the servants is
in attendance? who waits there?
(used in calling out to one's 
servants &c.; <ab>cf.</ab> Hindustāni {%ko hai%}).
reaching so far up; as tall as this.

an honorific epithet
meaning ‘worthy’, ‘revered’, 
‘honourable’, ‘your or his honour’, and
referring to a person that is present
or near the speaker, (<ab>opp.</ab> {#tatraBavat#});
